alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 3:42AM PST until January 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Esmeralda, Central Nye County, and Lincoln County. * WHEN...Through 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult across passes above 6000 feet. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County
